mapper.select: select m.id as id, m.username as username, m.idCard as idCard, m.tel as tel, u.id as "unit.id", u.name as "unit.name", m.openId as openId, m.status as status, m.remarks as remarks from member m left join unit u on m.unit_id = u.id

select m.id as id, m.username as username, m.idCard as idCard, m.tel as tel, u.id as "unit.id", u.name as "unit.name", m.openId as openId, m.status as status, m.remarks as remarks from member m left join unit u on m.unit_id = u.id where 1=1

mapper.insert: insert into member ( id, username, idCard, tel, unit_id, openId, status, remarks )values( #{id}, #{username}, #{idCard}, #{tel}, #{unit.id}, #{openId}, #{status}, #{remarks} )
